author: Reuters Editorial
title: Insurance Australia Group Posts HY Net Profit Attributable Of $551 Mln
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Insurance Australia Group Ltd:
* ‍GWP GUIDANCE FOR CURRENT FINANCIAL YEAR OF ‘LOW SINGLE DIGIT GROWTH’ REMAINS UNCHANGED​
* HY REVENUE FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES $‍8,272​ MILLION VERSUS $8,179 MILLION A YEAR AGO
* HY NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO IAG SHAREHOLDERS UP 23.5 % TO$551 MILLION
* INTERIM DIVIDEND 14.0 CENTS PER SHARE * ‍GROUP INCREASED ITS REPORTED MARGIN GUIDANCE FOR YEAR ENDED 30 JUNE 2018 FROM 12.5-14.5% TO 13.75-15.75%​
* HY TOTAL GWP OF $5,834 MILLION REPRESENTED A 0.6% INCREASE COMPARED TO CORRESPONDING HALF YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
